text: Leonard Harris (September 27, 1929 â€“ August 28, 2011) was an American actor, critic and author. He was known for his roles as Senator Charles Palantine in Taxi Driver (1976) and the mayor in Hero at Large (1980). Harris died of pneumonia on August 28, 2011 in Hartford, Connecticut at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2011 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American critics Category:Writers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City Category:Theatre critics
